about_the_game:
The Ereban: Shadow Legacy Original Soundtrack by composer Johan Holmström features 37 songs and 9 bonus tracks, all composed exclusively for the game.

The soundtrack mixes tones of nostalgia, mysticism, decadence, sci-fi, magic, tension and danger, which allow you to become immersed in the universe of Ereban: Shadow Legacy.

All files are available in both standard MP3 format and high quality WAV format.
